posts.content: Come on Rikki, keeping us hanging for nearly 2 months now...... When is it???
I should have the details this weekend, just trying to tie up a few things regarding the event location/venue. Watch this space
My eyes are hurting staring at this space !
Been watching this space for months!!

Ok.... finally got the dates for you

We are looking at the weekend of the 11th/12th/13th of September


Attached is a map of the venues location. The blue tankard represents the pub, along with the blue “P” representing parking (or on the weekend of the barn door meet, camping!). The address is: The Swan Hotel (pub), Bampton, Nr. Oxford, OX18 2SX. (camping charges will be about £12 per unit per night (not confirmed). The food is excellent and prices aren’t an arm and a leg! Also the very desirable one-off plaque will be available for all those that participate.

This Venue is located on the edge of the Cotswold’s, pretty much in the centre of England, and as you can see from the map, on an island in the middle of the Thames river! The area also has lots to offer for those of you who might want to get out and about.

The camping field opens promptly at 01:00 pm on Friday afternoon (11th of September), there’s plenty of room for everyone, so if you have a barn door, please try and make it regardless of the condition of your bus, you will be made more than welcome even if your bus has to be transported by trailer Also you are welcome to bring parts to trade and don't forget to bring stuff for the obligatory communal breakfast!

If you wish to attend, please leave your details and bus details on the list below
I you wish to attend without a barn door, please add you details to the separate list.

Feel free to post this add on Facebook etc. etc.

Location maps:
http://www.streetmap.co.uk/map.srf?x=42 ... 99541&lm=0
http://www.google.co.uk/imgres?imgurl=h ... s%3Disch:1

See you there

Rikki

Balls! I'm at Goodwood revival that weekend. Gutted! (Although happy to be going to Goodwood still)

Cool!
The links not working for me but it sounds like the same location of Campout 1? Is that right?
Really don't want to have to add my name to the 'non-barndoor' list we will see.
But wouldnt miss it for the world.
Bugger, looks like I better fix Rik's bus....
